name: Ben x Github, Oba.Nerdy.Style...
body:
### Haha, GitHub is so much fun!!
不是程序员也可以拿来各种玩，比如，你可以像小！胖！子！Jacob一样拿它来恶意卖萌
http://fat.github.io/slides-os-guilt/ 
http://fat.github.io/slow-flying-pizza/

Or use it to write collaborative fiction http://jj.github.io/hoborg/text/text

Or just jot down your travelogue with it https://github.com/dylanegan/travel  【Hello World! So gonna try it next time, still got so many places yet to be discovered. __Go Benny Go!__】

最重要的是，你可以用它来伪装为程序员！很！好！玩！有！木！有！哇！
```
$ if use github for vary purposes 
puts damn y r such a cute geeky head
elseif "what is github?"
puts "妈妈喊我回家吃饭了。拜拜。。"
end
```

![hey](http://ppcdn.500px.org/57287292/8c1375c4c4bf65f60969bc116776b863bf1563a5/2048.jpg)

> The bitterest tears shed over graves are for words left unsaid and deeds left undone.—— Harriet Beecher Stowe
> 最痛苦的泪水从坟墓里流出，为了还没有说出口的话和还没有做过的事。-- 哈里耶持·比彻·斯托
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
